channel.title: T2 error when spawned npc attacks
channel.description: everytime i spawn a npc and attack it or it attacks me, i get this error and dc [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/whi7wi.jpg[/img] this also happens when monsters are spanwned in fight cave, so my fight cave doesnt work anymore. i can't find anything like getnpcpos anybody know what to do?

item.title: T2 error when spawned npc attacks
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:5, topic:313936”][quote author=jamessemple link=topic=410424.msg3028004#msg3028004 date=1258157339]

wait… do u get this error on client or server?

I doubt your java experience is high if you can’t fucking read the cmd box.

lol dude i know full well it’s the client but because of that i was gonna see wat he replied then tell him to post it in client help ^^
[/quote]

Oh yeah sure…[/quote]
w/e lol

Read full topic
